Header.title: Cardano Charity Stake Pool
Header.paragraph: Life is busy, and it can sometimes be easy to forget to show your gratitude for all that youâ€™ve been given. If you are not in a position to contribute financially to charity, but are looking for other ways to give back, considering staking your ADA with us instead.

Services.name: Is there a risk in delegation?
Services.text: Staking is perfectly safe because You delegate your ADA to our Pool from your own wallet. Coins never leave your wallet!

Services.name: When will I receive my rewards?
Services.text: Delegate your ADA to the Pool and within 2 Epochs your coins become actively staked. After every 5 days end you will receive rewards for staking!

Services.name: Who pays for the charity service
Services.text: At the end of every month we distribute 20% of our(not yours) profit to charity. Follow more at our Facebook page.

Services.name: Can I use my ADA while staking?
Services.text: ADA stored on a delegated account can still be spent normally. Your funds are never frozen and you can always use them without any problem.
